name: 梅根·K·福克斯
name_full: 梅根·K·福克斯 Megan K. Fox
introduction: Megan K. Fox was born on January 15th 1992 in Dublin, Ireland as Megan Kathleen Fox. She is a director and writer, known for award winning short films, music videos and TV.She graduated with honors from the MA Directing course at Met Film School London in 2015 and also studied Screenwriting at Trinity College Dublin. She is fully trained in multi-camera directing for continuing drama following her completion of a competitive training course with Screen Ireland and RTÉ in 2018.Megan's work has been supported with funding from the Arts Council of Ireland, RTÉ, Film in Cork, o2 Think Big and more; screening and winning awards at festivals including Cork International Film Festival, Newport Beach Film Festival, Underwire, Iris Prize, Aesthetica, DIFF, Galway Film Fleadh and many more BAFTA and Academy affiliated events.
